description.plain:
Ruby Fields is an Australian indie, rock singer-songwriter from the Shire in NSW.

Her music career began with her debut single ‘I Want’ which was a viral success. This song was uncovered on Triple J’s Unearthed which a network designed to promote new Australian music. Within 24 hours of the song being released on Unearthed, Ruby tripled her followers, and her song appeared on the popular Australian radio station Triple J the next day.

Fields followed this up by releasing her first EP; Your Dad’s Opinion For Dinner on the 1st of March, 2018. The EP includes a range of tones from beautiful soft songs to up-beat teenage anthems.

Ruby Field’s is a dedicated artist; evident in how she creates her own guitars in the hope of producing the perfect sound. She also has directed her own music video.

Her music is loved for being a ‘burst of personality’ and ‘precociously relatable’..
